title: Looking for casual friends to play with on skype, bronze and silver welcome
body:
Hello, it's my first post here. I wish to climb up with some friendly players on Skype. I dropped from silver 2 in season 5 to bronz now. It's a pain of playing solo queue.

My main role is sup: Thresh, Alister, Tahm Kench, Braum, Janna, etc.
Also open for top and jungle with many champions.

IGN: mikethebrother2

Please don't be hesitate to add me. Thank you.

replies.body: Add me I am teemo jg main. xo janna xo
I'd add you but I'm a support main myself, so I could play ADC but I wouldn't consider myself good at it lol.
